Literature.Title: Characterization of a Lymphoid Organ Specific Anti-lipopolysaccharide Factor From Shrimp Reveals Structure-Activity Relationship of the LPS-Binding Domain.
Literature.Author: Li S, Lv X, Li F, Xiang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus(MIC=4-8µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=16-32µM),Vibrio alginolyticus(MIC=16-32µM),Vibrio harveyi(MIC=4-8µM),hotobacterium damselae subsp. damselae(MIC=4-8µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=>64µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus(MIC=>64µM),Vibrio campbellii(MIC=>64µM)
